name: MySLT
0:
”Alexa, open my s.l.t.”
”Alexa, ask my s. l. t. Check my Broadband Balance”
”Alexa, open my s. l. t. and Check my outstanding Balance”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my s. l. t.
des:
My SLT skill for Amazon Alexa. From checking your bill balance to adding data to your account, checking what's playing on your favorite PEO Tv channel is now possible using the Alexa voice service. Users of this skill need to be existing SLT-Mobitel customers who have signed up for MYSLT app.
Developer: The Connection Workshop
